text: how much of a threat does Russia pose at

illegally annexed Crimea
put over 40,000 of its troops right on
the Ukrainian border I think those
actions speak pretty clearly on what his
interests are now we know that the
Russians are pulling a lot of those
troops back but there are still many
that remain it is critically important
for NATO all European nations to
recognize this very real threat and
challenge to their security we have
responded to that I think very
effectively as you know I was just in
Brussels for two days of NATO

seen in 20 years President Obama has

night-vision goggles body armor that
